mapper.select:
select start_time,source_id from vss_log_eventlog where event_type=131585
and start_time>=to_date(#{queryTimeFrom},'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')
and start_time <= to_date(#{queryTimeTo},'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')
order by vss_log_eventlog_id

select round(cast(diff as numeric),2) diff_min,query_time from (select sum(date_part('minute', (t2.start_time-t1.start_time)))/count(1) diff, to_char(t1.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') query_time from (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num, * from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 01') t1, (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num, * from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 02') t2 where t1.row_num=t2.row_num
and t1.start_time>=to_date(#{queryTimeFrom},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t1.start_time < to_date(#{queryTimeTo},'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by to_char(t1.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')) t order by diff_min
${pager.postgreSqlQueryCondition}

select count(1) from (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num, * from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 01') t1, (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num, * from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 02') t2 where t1.row_num=t2.row_num
and to_char(t1.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{queryForOneDay}

select count(1) from (select count(1) from (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num, * from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 01') t1, (select row_number() OVER (ORDER BY vss_log_eventlog_id) as row_num,* from vss_log_eventlog where source_name='Camera 02') t2 where t1.row_num=t2.row_num
and t1.start_time>=to_date(#{queryTimeFrom},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t1.start_time < to_date(#{queryTimeTo},'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by to_char(t1.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')) t
